articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Jose Mourinho gives away his runners up medal to fan, lashes out at referee after Europa League final - The Indian Express
articles.description: Jose Mourinho suffered his first defeat in six European finals when Sevilla beat AS Roma.
articles.content: Jose Mourinho had never lost a European final but on Wednesday the Portuguese coach had to remain content with his runners-up medal after Sevilla beat AS Roma 4-1 on penalties on Wednesday and lift t… [+1575 chars]
